description.value:
Activate as Full Action, even if in melee. Everyone within 4 metres suffers 2d10 + User's Corruption Bonus Energy Damage with Concussive(2) and Felling(4) Qualities. Ignores Toughness and Armour, instead reduced by Willpower Bonus. Character then must pass -10 Toughness Bonus or be stunned for 1d5 Rounds. Recharges after 1 Round.

Requirements

Must be Dedicated to Khorne to use.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
